short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click a Jira ticket id (e.g.: XXX-123) and a pop-up with a link will appear.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click a Jira ticket id and a pop-up with a link will appear. Leaves the original text unmodified.

To close the pop-up, either:
- press Esc
- click somewhere else

By default, the Jira server used is https://issues.apache.org/jira, but you can change this on the extension options page (chrome://extensions -> Create Jira Link -> More Details -> Extension Options).

Source code: https://github.com/erwa/chrome-create-jira-link-plugin
